description: A Dart class representing a note entity with properties such as id, title, content, tags, creation and update timestamps. Includes methods for copying, serialization to/from a map, and formatted date display.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Model class for a note entity, encapsulating note details and providing utility methods.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Note instance with optional modified fields.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Serializes the Note instance into a Map for storage or transfer.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Creates a Note instance from a Map, typically retrieved from storage.

methods.name: formattedUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the formatted string of the updated timestamp.
